reviewText: What a great set.  All of the tapes available are good.  My only possible complaint is that they're too short.  It would also be kinda nice if more were available.  But I'm willing to take what I'm given, and these were great.  If you liked G.I. Joe cartoons as a kid I'm willing to bet you'll feel much the same.

As a child who grew up watching G.I. Joes I was in love with this set. With this video comes memories of childhood. It brings you back to a time where cartoons were fun and exciting. I loved the epsiodes featured in  this. As always the Joes battle Cobra who are seeking world domination. It  is a fun movie with a positive message in the end.

G.I. Joe has always been a mainstay in american animation ever since it's debut in the 80's. While the episodes are a bit random some of the best episodes are picked for the new videos. With this new box set we'll have 18  episodes on video. Start collecting now because this is the best time to  remember this clasic!
